Text.Page:
These damned orisk attacks are harming reclamation efforts. I won't have it. Kill {@LinkCreature:28#3021#reeking orisks} and collect their carapaces. Feel free to make them suffer a bit.

Report to Laneama when mission is complete.
Fine work deserves to be rewarded. Thank you.
Until the orisks are driven back, I'm not about to hand over the reward.
